knimeNode.name: Distance
knimeNode.shortDescription: Computes the distance with the previous SNV

fullDescription.intro:
Computes the distance with the previous SNV. It appends a new column with this distance. Warning, it doesn't take into account the sample's name. Mutations must be sorted on CHROM/POS.
References
Knime4Bio. Author: Pierre Lindenbaum PhD, INSERM UMR 915, Institut du thorax, Nantes. Reference: manuscript in preparation. Please, report any problem here.
